message: I have a great opportunity for you to purchase a high-quality product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $110.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but $110 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $105. What do you think?
I understand that $105 is still a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $108, and that's my final offer on this price.
